original_text: And now, though thou wouldest needs be gone, because thou sore longedst after thy father's house, yet wherefore hast thou stolen my gods?
korean_text: 이제 네가 네 아버지 집을 사모하여 돌아가려는 것은 옳거니와 어찌 내 신을 도둑질하였느냐

sentences.original_text: though thou wouldest needs be gone
because thou sore longedst after thy father's house
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 아비 집을 심히 갈망하므로

sentences.original_text: yet wherefore hast thou stolen my gods?
